sentences.sContent: Questions vary wildly from the political and the literary to the intimately personal — the magazine features one annoyed girlfriend asking her beau when he’s finally going to marry her.
sentences.sContent_eng: Questions vary wildly from the political and the literary to the intimately personal — the magazine features one annoyed girlfriend asking her beau when he’s finally going to marry her.
sentences.sCn: 问题多样而狂野，从政治、文学到个人私密——杂志专载了一位晕火的女孩，她问她的情郎什么时候敲定娶她。

synos.tran: 花花公子；喜修饰者；情郎

trans.tranCn: 花花公子；喜修饰者；情郎
